home.welcome.title: Welcome to GAIA-X
home.welcome.subtitle: A federated Data Infrastructure for Europe

message-bar.not-found: Oh no! We couldn't find any results.

form.regViaDIDIdPSelect: Please select IdSP to create a DID
form.almostDone: ...almost done: please check your email inbox now. We have sent you a message with a confirmation link.
form.formUserOrganization: Do you want to register a user or a provider?
form.formUserOne: Create your account in a few steps and benefit of our secure and transparent Federated Catalogue.
form.formUserTwo: Cool, so you want to become a customer! To issue you Verified Credentials, we need your account details.
form.formUserThree: Thanks for sending us your account details.
form.formUserDidReg: Please scan the QR code with you wallet app.
form.formUserDidRegHelp: So you have already a DID? Please scan the code.
form.formOrganizationOne: Cool, so you want to become a provider! To issue you Verified credentials, we need your organization's details.
form.formOrganizationOneInformation: Please upload your organization details or select express registration via DID.
form.formOrganizationPleaseVerifyYourself: Please verify yourself as employee of your organization.
form.formDisplayVC: We found the following details of your organization.
form.formDisplayVCUser: We found the following account details.
form.formComplianceCheck: But first, we have to do the compliance check.
form.formComplianceCheckHeading: Your onboarding request will be checked by the AISBL. This may take some time. Please enter your email address to receive status updates of your onboarding.
form.formOrganizationNameValidationError: Not valid empty string or blank for organization.
form.formOrganizationNoProcuraError: We couldn't find any authorized credentials. Please contact your organization.
form.organizationFormEmailSentHelp: Thanks for sending us your organization's details.
form.userFormEmailSentHelp: Thanks for sending us your account details.
form.formEmailSentMessage: ...almost done: please check your email inbox now. We have sent you a message with a confirmation link.
form.organizationConfirmationMessageSuccess: Thank's for confirming the email we've sent you. After submitting, your organization's details will be checked by the AISBL. You'll receive an email with your DID and Verified Credentials soon.
form.organizationConfirmationMessageError: The confirmation code is not longer valid.
form.userConfirmationMessageSuccess: Thank's for confirming the email we've sent you. After submitting, your organization's details will be checked by the AISBL. You'll receive an email with your DID and Verified Credentials soon.
form.userConfirmationMessageError: The confirmation code is not longer valid.
